text: Ishibashi Station is the name of multiple train stations in Japan. * Ishibashi Station (Tochigi) in Shomotsuke, Tochigi * Ishibashi Station (Nagasaki) in Nagasaki, Nagasaki ==See also== * Ishibashi handai-mae Station (formerly named Ishibashi Station) * Ise-Ishibashi Station * Minakuchi Ishibashi Station
title: Ishibashi Station
